channel.title: triacylglycerol on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in triacylglycerol on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsELT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g11690 Gene Symbol: CsELT1 Gene Name: Esterase/lipase/thioesterase 1 Genome: sweet orange (Citrus sinensis) reference genome Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsELT1 promotes the accumulation of β-chain carotenoids in plastid globules by forming a fat-soluble environment rich in triacylglycerol (TGA).

item.title: GmFATA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gyma.18G167300 Gene Symbol: GmFATA1 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and GmFATA2 are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: OsLP1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g40500 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0607100 Gene Symbol: OsLP1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.
